front.title: RADIUS Extension for Public Wireless LAN

abstract.t: This document describes additional Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) [1] attributes for use of RADIUS AAA (Authentication, Authorization, Accounting) in Public Wireless Local Area Network (PWLAN) deployments. Some of these attributes are already implemented as Vendor Specific Attributes (VSA) in networks today, but are core to PWLAN interoperability and roaming.
